content: As expected, our non-GAAP operating income rate declined compared to last year due to the increased promotional environment for consumer electronics, the investments in our growth initiatives and SG&A deleverage from the lower revenue. Conversely, when comparing to the pre-pandemic fiscal â20 comparable period, October had the most growth, while holiday shopping was more prevalent this October compared to pre-pandemic fiscal â20, it was lower than last year, when there was more of an urgency for consumers to get products early due to supply chain fears.
